species.name: meloetta
descriptions: Its melodies are sung with a special vocalization method that can control the feelings of those who hear it.
Many famous songs have been inspired by the melodies that Meloetta plays.
The melodies sung by Meloetta have the power to make Pok√©mon that hear them happy or sad.

abilities.name: serene-grace
abilities.effect: Doubles the chance of moves' extra effects occurring.
